1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import rospy
4 
5 # Command Status
6 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
7 
8 # Services
9 from tools_interface.srv import PingDxlTool
10 from tools_interface.srv import ToolCommand
11 from niryo_robot_rpi.srv import SetDigitalIO
12 from niryo_robot_rpi.srv import SetIOMode, SetIOModeRequest
13 
14 
15 class ToolRosCommandInterface:
16 
17  def __init__(self, state_ros_communication_problem):
18  self._digital_outputs = rospy.get_param("/niryo_robot_rpi/digital_outputs")
19 
20  namespace = rospy.get_param("~namespace_topics")
21  self.__service_open_gripper = rospy.ServiceProxy(namespace + 'open_gripper', ToolCommand)
22  self.__service_close_gripper = rospy.ServiceProxy(namespace + 'close_gripper', ToolCommand)
23 
24  self.__service_pull_air_vacuum_pump = rospy.ServiceProxy(namespace + 'pull_air_vacuum_pump', ToolCommand)
25  self.__service_push_air_vacuum_pump = rospy.ServiceProxy(namespace + 'push_air_vacuum_pump', ToolCommand)
26 
27  self.__service_ping_dxl_tool = rospy.ServiceProxy(namespace + 'ping_and_set_dxl_tool', PingDxlTool)
28 
29  self.__service_activate_digital_output_tool = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_rpi/set_digital_io',
30  SetDigitalIO)
31  self.__service_setup_digital_output_tool = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_rpi/set_digital_io_mode', SetIOMode)
32 
33  self.__state_ros_communication_problem = state_ros_communication_problem
34  rospy.logdebug("Interface between Tools Commander and ROS Control has been started.")
35 
36  # Gripper
37 
38  def open_gripper(self, gripper_id, open_position, open_speed, open_hold_torque, open_max_torque):
39  self.__service_open_gripper(id=gripper_id,
40  position=open_position,
41  speed=open_speed,
42  hold_torque=open_hold_torque,
43  max_torque=open_max_torque)
44  return True
45  # try:
46  # resp = self.__service_open_gripper(id=gripper_id, position=open_position, speed=open_speed,
47  # hold_torque=open_hold_torque, max_torque=open_max_torque)
48  # return resp.state
49  # except rospy.ServiceException:
50  # rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to Open Gripper")
51  # return self.__state_ros_communication_problem
52 
53  def close_gripper(self, gripper_id, close_position, close_speed, close_hold_torque, close_max_torque):
54  resp = self.__service_close_gripper(id=gripper_id,
55  position=close_position,
56  speed=close_speed,
57  hold_torque=close_hold_torque,
58  max_torque=close_max_torque)
59  return True

61  # resp = self.__service_close_gripper(id=gripper_id, position=close_position,
62  # speed=close_speed, hold_torque=close_hold_torque,
63  # max_torque=close_max_torque)
64  # return resp.state
65  # except rospy.ServiceException:
66  # rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to Close Gripper")
67  # return self.__state_ros_communication_problem
68 
69  # Vacuum
70  def pull_air_vacuum_pump(self,
71  vp_id,
72  vp_pull_air_velocity,
73  vp_pull_air_position,
74  vp_pull_air_max_torque,
75  vp_pull_air_hold_torque):
76  try:
77  resp = self.__service_pull_air_vacuum_pump(id=vp_id,
78  speed=vp_pull_air_velocity,
79  position=vp_pull_air_position,
80  max_torque=vp_pull_air_max_torque,
81  hold_torque=vp_pull_air_hold_torque)
82  return resp.state
83  except rospy.ServiceException:
84  rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to Pull Air")
85  return self.__state_ros_communication_problem
86 
87  def push_air_vacuum_pump(self, vp_id, vp_push_air_velocity, vp_push_air_position, vp_push_air_max_torque):
88  try:
89  resp = self.__service_push_air_vacuum_pump(id=vp_id,
90  speed=vp_push_air_velocity,
91  position=vp_push_air_position,
92  max_torque=vp_push_air_max_torque,
93  hold_torque=0)
94  return resp.state
95  except rospy.ServiceException:
96  rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to Push Air")
97  return self.__state_ros_communication_problem
98 
99  # Others
100  def ping_dxl_tool(self):
101  try:
102  resp = self.__service_ping_dxl_tool()
103  if (resp is not None):
104  return resp.state, resp.tool.id
105  else:
106  return CommandStatus.TOOL_ROS_INTERFACE_ERROR, "Cannot ping dxl tool"
107  except rospy.ServiceException:
108  rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to Ping Dynamixel Tool - "
109  "An error has occurred or another ping was running")
110  return CommandStatus.TOOL_ROS_INTERFACE_ERROR, "Cannot ping dxl tool"
111 
112  def digital_output_tool_setup(self, gpio_name):
113  if rospy.get_param("/niryo_robot/hardware_version") in ['ned2', 'ned3pro']:
114  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success"
115 
116  try:
117  resp = self.__service_setup_digital_output_tool(gpio_name, SetIOModeRequest.OUTPUT) # set output
118  return resp.status, resp.message
119  except rospy.ServiceException:
120  rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to get digital output setup")
121  return CommandStatus.TOOL_ROS_INTERFACE_ERROR, "Digital IO panel service failed"
122 
123  def digital_output_tool_activate(self, gpio_name, activate):
124  try:
125  resp = self.__service_activate_digital_output_tool(gpio_name, bool(activate))
126  return resp.status, resp.message
127  except rospy.ServiceException:
128  rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to activate digital output")
129  return CommandStatus.TOOL_ROS_INTERFACE_ERROR, "Digital IO panel service failed"
